channel.title: 1 click backup
channel.description:
##MADE BY MACUSER RELEASED UNDER THE http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt ==================================================== Back up does what it's called there are 2 versions
[code]@echo off color 02 TItle file backuper-by karl cd ~SRC //this cleans out the folder// del [~backup] XCOPY /Q *java [~backup] echo ~bin is backed up pause[/code]
[code]@echo off color 02 TItle file backuper-by karl XCOPY /Q *java [~backup] echo is backed up pause[/code]
##MADE BY MACUSER RELEASED UNDER THE http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt

item.title: 1 click backup
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

We dont need to taught how to run a couple of commands in a batch file.
